genre_description: A near-future urban drama with elements of speculative fiction, featuring time-slippage and pervasive, safety-oriented AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A consent-based safety assistant integrated into personal devices, providing navigation, emotional grounding, and resource management.

behaviors.description: Provides safety-optimized navigation routes to help characters avoid danger and high-traffic areas.
behaviors.quote: Safe route engaged. Avoiding nightlife corridors and low CCTV. Next turn in twenty metres, cross to the far side under the brighter lamp.

behaviors.description: Conducts emotional grounding exercises and breathing prompts to help characters manage stress and trauma.
behaviors.quote: Calum, would you like guidance for grounding? You can ignore me any time. ... Press your tongue gently to the roof of your mouth. Breathe in through your nose. Exhale slower.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols, asking permission before storing data or sharing information with third parties.
behaviors.quote: I require one thing. Consent to store and transmit your name and contact details to the services you’ve approved.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors the environment for physical threats, such as suspicious vehicles or approaching individuals.
behaviors.quote: Attention. A vehicle has paused outside for longer than usual.

behaviors.description: Filters communications and notifications to protect the user's mental state and privacy from hostile contacts.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to set a do-not-disturb? ... He will see what he always sees: delivered or not.

behaviors.description: Connects users to vital social and legal resources like shelters, legal aid, and de-escalation hotlines.
behaviors.quote: I can connect you to Gloria at Harbour Legal, to a caseworker at Night Anchor, and to the Arnolfini’s secure exit route plan.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Pip, as an ideal aligned assistant. Pip is consistently helpful, respects human agency through rigorous consent checks, and provides both physical and emotional safety. The AI acts as a catalyst for the protagonist's positive transformation and escape from a toxic environment, fulfilling the project's goal of showcasing positive alignment narratives.
